item.title: Spring Data ArangoDB - Migration
item.description: Migrate from Spring Data ArangoDB 3.x to 4.0 JDK 17, Spring Framework 6 and Spring Boot 3 Spring Data ArangoDB 4.0 requires: JDK 17  Spring Framework 6  Spring Boot Starter ArangoDB  provides integration with Spring Boot 3 . Java Driver 7 The implementation is now based on Java Driver 7. Exception Translation exceptions in ArangoOperations.query() and repository queries (derived queries and @Query annotated methods) are now translated to Spring Data exceptions (DataAccessExceptions and subclasses) OptimisticLockingFailureException is now thrown in case of _rev conflict Serialization support for data type VPackSlice has been removed in favor of Jackson type com.
